name: Monty Python & The Quest for the Holy Grail
name_original: Monty Python & The Quest for the Holy Grail
description:
Monty Python & The Quest for the Holy Grail is an adventure-arcade game developed by 7th Level. It was originally released in 1996. 7th Level published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Monty Python & The Quest for the Holy Grail is available on PC.
